sense.def:
Na dokumentu je
a seal
uradno znamenje, ki dokazuje, da je dokument pristen.

A seal
je tudi nekaj, kar je pritrjeno na embalažo ali pismo in kar moramo zlomiti, preden lahko embalažo ali pismo odpremo.

seg.quote: I noticed that the seals of the packet had been broken.

sense.def:
To seal an envelope
pomeni zlepiti skupaj zavihek in spodnjo stran ovojnice.

seg.quote: Mrs Slesers sealed the envelopes and left them on her desk.
He took a sealed envelope from the folder on his desk.

sense.def:
To seal an opening
pomeni zapolniti ali prekriti odprtino, tako da zrak, plin ali tekočina ne more uhajati skoznjo.

seg.quote: Small cracks can be sealed with this compound.
...a thin tube sealed at one end.

sense.def:
To give something one's seal of approval
pomeni uradno izjaviti, da nekaj odobravamo.

A seal
je tudi velika lesketajoča se žival brez nog, ki jé ribe in živi delno na kopnem in delno v morju.

To seal a place off
pomeni zapreti vse vhode v prostor ali do nekega kraja, tako da nihče ne more noter ali ven.
